name: Nox Mortuorum
description:
The thin line between the physical world and the spirit realm is in the risk of being destroyed. What are you gonna do?

 The game is based on a cyberpunk dystopia where a powerful mafia leader have his scientists working in new technologies, but one of the inventions is breaking the thin line between the reality and the spirit realm.

This game is designed as a 3D interactive experience where your goal is to search all the clues to find where the scientists are, but the main goal is to feel the environment which is the most important part of the game, even tough this needs some polishing so it can really stand out.

The actual level is designed as kind of initial lobby/tutorial where you will progress to an actual bigger level with the actual gameplay.

This is an interactive environment where the main goal is to watch what is going around one of the markets of the black market in a cyberpunk realm. 

Your job is to find the way out of there while discovering some keys that in the future will be useful for you.

  • Genre: First person interactive environment.
  • Art style: Stylized  fantasy.
  • Engine: Unreal Engine 4.
  • Language: Spanish/Español.

This game was done as a big term project for class, the main goal/requirement was to reach a good visual level more than a good gameplay itself.
